Hero.learnFrontendWithTech: with React, Next Js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS
Hero.learnFullstackWithTech: with Next js, Node js, MongoDB

Footer.allRightsText: This is the amro97 Academy website.

FrontendVideos.Title: Learn Frontend Development with Projects
FrontendVideos.ApplyAtLeast: If you apply at least 5-6 frontend projects you will be able to do most things that you want if you want to make real projects.

FullstackVideos.Title: Learn Fullstack Development with Projects
FullstackVideos.GetMostBenifits: If you want to apply fullstack projects in the shortest time and get most benefits, you can follow this video
FullstackVideos.ApplyAtLeast: If you apply at least 3-4 good fullstack projects you will be able to do most things that you want if you want to make real projects.
FullstackVideos.Example7: Yes. It adheres to the WAI-ARIA design pattern.

VideoAndMenuDesc.Description1: If you spend at least about 4 to 5 hours every day from (6-7 am) until (4-5 pm)
VideoAndMenuDesc.Description2: applying from projects you can finish applying about 2-3 hours from the youtube projects each day.
